* I am a post-doc researcher at Heidelberg University Earth Sciences Institute.
My research interests are volcanology, geology, geochemistry, geochronology


Academic career
Seit 10/2022	Postdoc, Heidelberg University
2019 - 09/2022	Research Assistant, Konya Technical University, Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences, Konya, Türkei
2017 - 2022	B.Sc. program (Energy Systems Engineering), Necmettin Erbakan University, Faculty of Engineering and Architecture, Konya, Türkei
2015 - 2019	PhD student (Mineralogy & petrology), Konya Technical University, Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences, Konya, Türkei
2013 - 2015	M.Sc. student (Mineralogy & petrology), Selcuk University, Institute of Science and Technology, Department of Geological Engineering, Konya, Türkei
2009 - 2013	B.Sc. student (Chemical Engineering, double major), Ankara University Faculty of Engineering, Ankara, Türkei
2007 - 2012	B.Sc. student (Geological Engineering), Ankara University Faculty of Engineering, Ankara, Türkei
